mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET delivery_status = #{deliveryStatus}, delivery_completed_by_seq = #{deliveryCompletedBySeq}, delivery_completed_at = #{deliveryCompletedAt}, invoice_generated_at = #{invoiceGeneratedAt}, payment_due_date = #{paymentDueDate}, notes = #{notes}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE order_seq = #{orderSeq}

UPDATE orders SET payment_status = #{paymentStatus}, payment_completed_date = #{paymentCompletedDate}, payment_completed_by_seq = #{paymentCompletedBySeq}, payment_completed_by = #{paymentCompletedBy}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE order_seq = #{orderSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT o.order_seq, o.company_seq, o.user_seq, o.order_number, o.order_date, o.status, o.delivery_status, o.total_amount, o.discount_rate, o.discount_amount, o.final_amount, o.approved_by, o.approved_at, o.notes, o.created_at, o.updated_at, o.version, o.payment_status, o.payment_due_date, o.payment_completed_date, o.invoice_generated_at, o.payment_completed_by_seq, o.payment_completed_by, o.delivery_completed_by_seq, o.delivery_completed_at, c.company_name, u.nickname as user_name, u.email as user_email, du.nickname as delivery_completed_by FROM orders o LEFT JOIN companies c ON o.company_seq = c.company_seq LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_seq = u.user_seq LEFT JOIN users du ON o.delivery_completed_by_seq = du.user_seq WHERE o.order_seq = #{orderSeq}

SELECT o.order_seq, o.company_seq, o.user_seq, o.order_number, o.order_date, o.status, o.delivery_status, o.total_amount, o.discount_rate, o.discount_amount, o.final_amount, o.approved_by, o.approved_at, o.notes, o.created_at, o.updated_at, o.version, c.company_name, u.nickname as user_name, u.email as user_email FROM orders o LEFT JOIN companies c ON o.company_seq = c.company_seq LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE o.order_number = #{orderNumber}

SELECT o.order_seq, o.company_seq, o.user_seq, o.order_number, o.order_date, o.status, o.delivery_status, o.total_amount, o.discount_rate, o.discount_amount, o.final_amount, o.approved_by, o.approved_at, o.notes, o.created_at, o.updated_at, o.version, c.company_name, u.nickname as user_name, u.email as user_email FROM orders o LEFT JOIN companies c ON o.company_seq = c.company_seq LEFT JOIN users u ON o.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE o.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY o.order_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(order_number, LENGTH(#{datePrefix}) + 1) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) FROM orders WHERE order_number LIKE CONCAT(#{datePrefix}, '%')
